backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing inquiries in a map with submit, list, and filter functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI issues and fixes to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the roles of major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining color variables, themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKS.md: Manual regression checklist ensuring Contact section buttons display and behave correctly in production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing Header, hero, About, Services, Contact, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Logo component showing an image with a fallback NK initials block if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Contact section with direct-call and WhatsApp buttons plus an inquiry form using validation and submission hooks.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, and contact details including owner, phone, email, and address.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Provides a sticky header with brand logo and navigation links, including a mobile menu using a sheet component.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Displays the hero banner with title, description, call‑to‑action buttons, and a featured image, supporting smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryList: Debug-only component that lists submitted inquiries in a collapsible table using backend data.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCate: Shows product categories in a grid using cards, each listing related technology items.
frontend/src/components/site/ScrollToSec: Custom link component that smooth‑scrolls to a target section on click or keyboard activation.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper component for page sections adding spacing, container layout, and optional ID.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Displays a services overview with icons, descriptions, and images inside a styled section layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryList.ts: Fetches all inquiries from the backend actor using React Query, enabled when the actor is ready.
Handles inquiry form validation and submission to the backend, exposing status and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context/provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus utility classes and typography adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/serviceInterest.ts: Provides service interest options and helper functions to map between UI values, labels, and backend ServiceInterest enums.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, fonts, sizing, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, known issues, and current state for the NK SYSTECH website build.
